GSD.description:
drm/amd/display: Fix memory leak

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.34 by commit 7e10369c72db7a0e2f77b2e306aadc07aef6b07a. For more details please see the references link.
